rukus.text: hananim-eun changjoleul gaesihasa geugeos-eul doepul-i hasini neohuineun geu bun-egelo gwiuihanola
simpan-ui nal-i oneun nal joeindeul-eun jeolmang halila
geudeul-eun geudeul-ui dongbanjadeul ga undeseo jungjaejaleul gaj-ji moshal geos-i myeo geudeul-ui dongbanjadeul-eun ileul bujeong hal geos-ila
simpan-ui nal-i oneun geunal geuttaegeudeul-eun seolo hyeeojinila
geuleona mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eun cheongug-eseo hwandaeleul bad eul geos-iyo
hananim-ui malsseumgwa naeseeseouisangbong-eul bulsinhamyeo ileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-egeneun beol-i iss-eulila
geuleomeulo jeonyeog-i doego achim i omyeon hananim-eul chan-yanghala
cheonjiui modeun geos-i jeonyeog ttae wa hannaj-e geubun-eul chanmihanola
hananim-eun jug-eun jaleul sosaengkehasigo sanjaleul imjongke hasimyeo jug eun daejileul saengdongke hasini geuwa gat-i neohuideuldo dasi sal-analila
